34 #include <opencv2/highgui/highgui.hpp>
35 #include <iostream>
36 #include "opencv2/imgproc/imgproc.hpp"
37 #include "FlyCapture2.h"
38 #include <cv.h>
39 #include <vector>
40 #include <stdlib.h>
41 #include <stdio.h>
42 #include "calibration/camera_config.h"
43 #include <stdlib.h>
44 
51 int main(int argc, char **argv)
52 {
53  //PointGrey
54  Error error;
55 
56  BusManager busManager;
57  unsigned int numCameras;
58  error = busManager.GetNumOfCameras(&numCameras);
59  if(error != PGRERROR_OK)
60  {
61  cout<<"Failed to get number of cameras"<<endl;
62  return false;
63  }
64  cout<<"number of cameras "<<numCameras<<endl;
65 
66  //Camera camera1, camera2;
67  Camera** ppCameras = new Camera*[numCameras];
68 
69  for(unsigned int i=0; i<numCameras;i++)
70  {
71  ppCameras[i] = new Camera();
72 
73  PGRGuid pGuid;
74  error = busManager.GetCameraFromIndex(i,&pGuid);
75  if(error != PGRERROR_OK)
76  {
77  cout<<"Failed to get index of camera 1"<<endl;
78  return false;
79  }
80  //cout<<"index camera 1 - "<<pGuid1.value<<endl;
81 
82 
83  CameraInfo camInfo;
84 
85  //connect the two cameras
86  error=ppCameras[i]->Connect(&pGuid);
87  if ( error != PGRERROR_OK )
88  {
89  cout << "Failed to connect to camera"<<i <<endl;
90  return false;
91  }
92 
93  // Get the camera info and print it out
94  error = ppCameras[i]->GetCameraInfo( &camInfo );
95  if ( error != PGRERROR_OK )
96  {
97  cout << "Failed to get camera info from camera" << endl;
98  return false;
99  }
100  cout << camInfo.vendorName << " "
101  << camInfo.modelName << " "
102  << camInfo.serialNumber << endl;
103  }
104 
105  SetConfiguration(ppCameras[0]);
106  SetConfiguration(ppCameras[1]);
107 
108  for(int i =0;i<numCameras;i++)
109  {
110  error = ppCameras[i]->StartCapture();
111  if ( error == PGRERROR_ISOCH_BANDWIDTH_EXCEEDED )
112  {
113  cout << "Bandwidth exceeded" << endl;
114  return false;
115  }
116  else if ( error != PGRERROR_OK )
117  {
118  cout << "Failed to start image capture" << endl;
119  return false;
120  }
121 
122  }
123 
124 
125  Mat imgGRAY1, imgGRAY2;
126 
127  // create the main window, and attach the trackbars
128  namedWindow( "Camera 1", CV_WINDOW_NORMAL );
129  namedWindow( "Camera 2", CV_WINDOW_NORMAL );
130 
131  int numBoards = 0;
132  int numCornersHor;
133  int numCornersVer;
134 
135  printf("Enter number of corners along width: ");
136  scanf("%d", &numCornersHor);
137 
138  printf("Enter number of corners along height: ");
139  scanf("%d", &numCornersVer);
140 
141  printf("Enter number of boards: ");
142  scanf("%d", &numBoards);
143 
144  int numSquares = numCornersHor*numCornersVer;
145  Size board_sz = Size(numCornersHor, numCornersVer);
146 
147  vector<vector<Point3f> > object_points, object_points2;
148  vector<vector<Point2f> > image_points, image_points2;
149 
150  vector<Point2f> corners, corners2;
151  int successes=0;
152 
153  vector<Point3f> obj;
154  for(int j=0;j<numSquares;j++)
155  obj.push_back(Point3f(j/numCornersHor, j%numCornersHor, 0.0f));
156 
157  Mat image1, image2;
158 
159  // capture loop
160  while(successes<numBoards)
161  {
162  // Get the image camera 1
163  Image rawImage1;
164  Error error = ppCameras[0]->RetrieveBuffer( &rawImage1 );
165  if ( error != PGRERROR_OK )
166  {
167  //cout << "capture error" << endl;
168  continue;
169  }
170 
171  // Get the image camera 2
172  Image rawImage2;
173  error = ppCameras[1]->RetrieveBuffer( &rawImage2 );
174  if ( error != PGRERROR_OK )
175  {
176  //cout << "capture error" << endl;
177  continue;
178  }
179 
180  // convert to rgb
181  Image rgbImage1;
182  rawImage1.Convert(PIXEL_FORMAT_BGR, &rgbImage1 );
183 
184  // convert to OpenCV Mat
185  unsigned int rowBytes1 = (double)rgbImage1.GetReceivedDataSize()/(double)rgbImage1.GetRows();
186  image1 = Mat(rgbImage1.GetRows(), rgbImage1.GetCols(), CV_8UC3, rgbImage1.GetData(),rowBytes1);
187 
188  // convert to rgb
189  Image rgbImage2;
190  rawImage2.Convert(PIXEL_FORMAT_BGR, &rgbImage2 );
191 
192  // convert to OpenCV Mat
193  unsigned int rowBytes2 = (double)rgbImage2.GetReceivedDataSize()/(double)rgbImage2.GetRows();
194  image2 = Mat(rgbImage2.GetRows(), rgbImage2.GetCols(), CV_8UC3, rgbImage2.GetData(),rowBytes2);
195 
196  cvtColor(image1, imgGRAY1, CV_BGR2GRAY);//convert the image from BGR to Gray scale
197  cvtColor(image2, imgGRAY2, CV_BGR2GRAY);//convert the image from BGR to Gray scale
198 
199  bool found1 = findChessboardCorners(imgGRAY1, board_sz, corners, CV_CALIB_CB_ADAPTIVE_THRESH | CV_CALIB_CB_FILTER_QUADS);
200  bool found2 = findChessboardCorners(imgGRAY2, board_sz, corners2, CV_CALIB_CB_ADAPTIVE_THRESH | CV_CALIB_CB_FILTER_QUADS);
201 
202 
203  if(found1 && found2)
204  {
205  cornerSubPix(imgGRAY1, corners, Size(11, 11), Size(-1, -1), TermCriteria(CV_TERMCRIT_EPS | CV_TERMCRIT_ITER, 30, 0.1));
206  drawChessboardCorners(imgGRAY1, board_sz, corners, found1);
207  cornerSubPix(imgGRAY2, corners2, Size(11, 11), Size(-1, -1), TermCriteria(CV_TERMCRIT_EPS | CV_TERMCRIT_ITER, 30, 0.1));
208  drawChessboardCorners(imgGRAY2, board_sz, corners2, found2);
209  //cout<<"fouded chessboard"<<endl;
210 
211  image_points.push_back(corners);
212  object_points.push_back(obj);
213  image_points2.push_back(corners2);
214  object_points2.push_back(obj);
215  cout<<"Snap stored!\n"<<endl;
216 
217  successes++;
218  if(successes>=numBoards)
219  break;
220  }
221 
222  imshow("Camera 1", imgGRAY1);
223  imshow("Camera 2", imgGRAY2);
224 
225  int key = waitKey(1);
226  if(key==27)
227  return 0;
228 
229  sleep(3);
230  }
231 
232  Mat intrinsic = Mat(3, 3, CV_64FC1);
233  Mat intrinsic2 = Mat(3, 3, CV_64FC1);
234  Mat distCoeffs;
235  Mat distCoeffs2;
236  Mat R, T, E, F;
237 
238  stereoCalibrate(object_points, image_points, image_points2,intrinsic,distCoeffs,intrinsic2,distCoeffs2,image1.size(),R,T,E,F,cvTermCriteria(CV_TERMCRIT_ITER+CV_TERMCRIT_EPS, 100, 1e-5),CV_CALIB_SAME_FOCAL_LENGTH | CV_CALIB_ZERO_TANGENT_DIST);
239 
240 
241  cout<<"Matrix camera 1"<<endl;
242  cout<<intrinsic<<endl;
243 
244  cout<<"distorcion camera 1"<<endl;
245  cout<<distCoeffs<<endl;
246 
247  cout<<"Matrix camera 2"<<endl;
248  cout<<intrinsic2<<endl;
249 
250  cout<<"distorcion camera 2"<<endl;
251  cout<<distCoeffs2<<endl;
252 
253  cout<<"translations "<<endl;
254  cout<<T<<endl;
255 
256  cout<<"rotation "<<endl;
257  cout<<R<<endl;
258 
259  Mat R1, R2, P1, P2, Q;
260  stereoRectify(intrinsic, distCoeffs, intrinsic2, distCoeffs2, image1.size(), R, T, R1, R2, P1, P2, Q,CALIB_ZERO_DISPARITY);
261 
262  FileStorage fs1("mystereocalib.yml", FileStorage::WRITE);
263  fs1 << "CM1" << intrinsic;
264  fs1 << "CM2" << intrinsic2;
265  fs1 << "D1" << distCoeffs;
266  fs1 << "D2" << distCoeffs2;
267  fs1 << "R" << R;
268  fs1 << "T" << T;
269  fs1 << "E" << E;
270  fs1 << "F" << F;
271  fs1 << "R1" << R1;
272  fs1 << "R2" << R2;
273  fs1 << "P1" << P1;
274  fs1 << "P2" << P2;
275  fs1 << "Q" << Q;
276 
277  fs1.release();
278 
279  //destroyWindow("Hough Circle Transform Demo"); //destroy the window with the name, "MyWindow"
280 
281  return 0;
282 }
